languages.text: "Мощь нашего врага... немыслима. Вознесите молитву Неумирающему, ибо скоро мы будем подле Трона Его".
"Our enemy's might is... unfathomable. Offer a prayer to the Undying One, for we will appear before His Throne soon."
languages.original_text: "Мощь нашего врага... немыслима. Вознесите молитву Неумирающему, ибо скоро мы будем подле Трона Его".

languages.text: «La fuerza del enemigo es... inimaginable. Ofrezcan una oración al Inmortal, pues pronto nos presentaremos ante Su Trono».
languages.original_text: "Our enemy's might is... unfathomable. Offer a prayer to the Undying One, for we will appear before His Throne soon."

traits.locale_text: «La fuerza del enemigo es... inimaginable. Ofrezcan una oración al Inmortal, pues pronto nos presentaremos ante Su Trono».

languages.text: 「私達の敵の力は…計り知れない。不死の者に祈りを捧げ、我々はまもなく神の玉座の前に姿を現します」
languages.original_text: "Our enemy's might is... unfathomable. Offer a prayer to the Undying One, for we will appear before His Throne soon."

traits.locale_text: 「私達の敵の力は…計り知れない。不死の者に祈りを捧げ、我々はまもなく神の玉座の前に姿を現します」

languages.text: “我们敌人的力量……深不可测。向不死之神祈祷吧，因为我们恐怕很快就要见到祂的王座了。”
languages.original_text: "Our enemy's might is... unfathomable. Offer a prayer to the Undying One, for we will appear before His Throne soon."

traits.locale_text: “我们敌人的力量……深不可测。向不死之神祈祷吧，因为我们恐怕很快就要见到祂的王座了。”

languages.text: "Die Macht unseres Feindes ist ... unauslotbar. Betet zum Todlosen, denn wir werden schon bald vor Seinem Thron stehen."
languages.original_text: "Our enemy's might is... unfathomable. Offer a prayer to the Undying One, for we will appear before His Throne soon."

traits.locale_text: "Die Macht unseres Feindes ist ... unauslotbar. Betet zum Todlosen, denn wir werden schon bald vor Seinem Thron stehen."

languages.text: « La puissance de notre ennemi est... insondable. Adressez donc une prière à l'Immortel, car nous allons bientôt comparaître devant Son trône. »
languages.original_text: "Our enemy's might is... unfathomable. Offer a prayer to the Undying One, for we will appear before His Throne soon."

traits.locale_text: « La puissance de notre ennemi est... insondable. Adressez donc une prière à l'Immortel, car nous allons bientôt comparaître devant Son trône. »

languages.text: "Düşmanımızın kudreti... Akıl almaz boyutlarda. Ölmeyen'e dua et. O ki İmparator'un Tahtı huzurundaki yerini tez vakitte alacak."
languages.original_text: "Our enemy's might is... unfathomable. Offer a prayer to the Undying One, for we will appear before His Throne soon."
